title: Automatic SSL Certificates
description: Traefik handles SSL certificates automatically via Let's Encrypt. Just add labels to your Docker services and certificates are obtained and renewed automatically.

title: Real-time Security
description: CrowdSec monitors your traffic in real-time, detects malicious behavior, and automatically blocks threats. It shares intelligence with a global community to stay ahead of attackers.

title: Simple Architecture
description: Three containers work together seamlessly: Traefik routes traffic, CrowdSec analyzes logs, and the bouncer blocks threats. All connected via a dedicated Docker network.

$ docker ps
